text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int n , r , j , i , l ; int s [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < r ; j ++ ) { if ( i <= j ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } else { a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } } for ( j = 0 ; j < r - 1 ; j ++ ) { s [ j ] = a [ 0 ] [ j ] + a [ 0 ] [ j + 1 ] + a [ 1 ] [ j + 2 ] ; } l = s [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j < r - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( l < s [ j ] ) { l = s [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , l ) ; } return 0 ; }
